name: Deathmon
description: Deathmon ( デスモン ) Debut C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN Partners Shin'ichirou Jōsaki Variations • Death Airdramon • Death Devimon • Death Meramon • Death MetalGreymon • Death Tyranomon Deathmon is a Digimon who can assume a "Death" form of any foe it has been uploaded with.
